Topic.Title: On Sunday, during an appearance on Meet The Press, Colin Powell condemned the GOP’s “dark vein of intolerance” and the party’s repeated use of racial code words to oppose President Obama and rally white conservative voters.

Message.Msg: racially charged code words. You and other libs think there is a special lexicon just for racial code words.Sheesh.

Topic.Title: Calif real estate off the charts??

Message.Msg: I'm still trying to sell a house in San Diego County. It was run down and my buyer is trying to get a rehabilitation loan. It' has been going on for six months. My price is right and with bringing the house up to par it is a good deal for the person buying. It was appraised with the rehab at about $240,000. Recently similar homes in the area went for over $300,000.
